title: S3: "Failed to set modification time: InvalidRange"
body:
#### What is the problem you are having with rclone?

Bug in the latest version of rclone (`v1.50.2`) where changing the modified date of a file fails on a S3 remote.
In version `v1.49.5` this bug was not present yet.

#### What is your rclone version (output from `rclone version`)

`v1.50.2`
(also tested with the latest beta: `v1.50.2-073-ge2773b3b`)

#### Which OS you are using and how many bits (eg Windows 7, 64 bit)

Ubuntu 16.04.4 LTS, 64-bit

####  Which cloud storage system are you using? (eg Google Drive)

S3-compatible interface (own hosted Ceph cluster with RADOS GW)

#### The command you were trying to run (eg `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

`./rclone-v1.50.2-linux-amd64/rclone copy --s3-chunk-size=50M /home/user/myfile.dat ceph-custer:data/mydata`

#### A log from the command with the `-vv` flag (eg output from `rclone -vv copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

v1.50.2 (fail):
```
root@myhost ~ # ./rclone-v1.50.2-linux-amd64/rclone -vvv copy --s3-chunk-size=50M /home/user/myfile.dat ceph-custer:data/mydata
2019/12/02 13:25:57 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.50.2" starting with parameters ["./rclone-v1.50.2-linux-amd64/rclone" "-vvv" "copy" "--s3-chunk-size=50M" "/home/user/myfile.dat" "ceph-custer:data/mydata"]
2019/12/02 13:25:57 DEBUG : Using config file from "/root/rclone-v1.50.2-linux-amd64/rclone.conf"
2019/12/02 13:25:57 DEBUG : myfile.dat: Modification times differ by -18.718573627s: 2019-12-02 11:36:58.718573627 +0100 CET, 2019-12-02 11:36:40 +0100 CET
2019/12/02 13:25:58 DEBUG : myfile.dat: MD5 = 45cd09bdd16261f03588c31630decefd OK
2019/12/02 13:26:03 ERROR : myfile.dat: Failed to set modification time: InvalidRange:
	status code: 416, request id: tx00000000000005bed0aa5-005de502da-97f07-default, host id:
2019/12/02 13:26:03 DEBUG : myfile.dat: Unchanged skipping
2019/12/02 13:26:03 ERROR : Attempt 1/3 failed with 1 errors and: InvalidRange:
	status code: 416, request id: tx00000000000005bed0aa5-005de502da-97f07-default, host id:
2019/12/02 13:26:03 DEBUG : myfile.dat: Modification times differ by -18.718573627s: 2019-12-02 11:36:58.718573627 +0100 CET, 2019-12-02 11:36:40 +0100 CET
2019/12/02 13:26:04 DEBUG : myfile.dat: MD5 = 45cd09bdd16261f03588c31630decefd OK
2019/12/02 13:26:08 ERROR : myfile.dat: Failed to set modification time: InvalidRange:
	status code: 416, request id: tx00000000000005bed0acf-005de502e0-97f07-default, host id:
2019/12/02 13:26:08 DEBUG : myfile.dat: Unchanged skipping
2019/12/02 13:26:08 ERROR : Attempt 2/3 failed with 1 errors and: InvalidRange:
	status code: 416, request id: tx00000000000005bed0acf-005de502e0-97f07-default, host id:
2019/12/02 13:26:08 DEBUG : myfile.dat: Modification times differ by -18.718573627s: 2019-12-02 11:36:58.718573627 +0100 CET, 2019-12-02 11:36:40 +0100 CET
2019/12/02 13:26:09 DEBUG : myfile.dat: MD5 = 45cd09bdd16261f03588c31630decefd OK
2019/12/02 13:26:14 ERROR : myfile.dat: Failed to set modification time: InvalidRange:
	status code: 416, request id: tx00000000000005bed0af0-005de502e5-97f07-default, host id:
2019/12/02 13:26:14 DEBUG : myfile.dat: Unchanged skipping
2019/12/02 13:26:14 ERROR : Attempt 3/3 failed with 1 errors and: InvalidRange:
	status code: 416, request id: tx00000000000005bed0af0-005de502e5-97f07-default, host id:
2019/12/02 13:26:14 Failed to copy: InvalidRange:
	status code: 416, request id: tx00000000000005bed0af0-005de502e5-97f07-default, host id:
root@myhost ~ # echo $?
1
```

v1.49.5 (success)
```
root@myhost ~ # ./rclone-v1.49.5-linux-amd64/rclone -vvv copy --s3-chunk-size=50M /home/user/myfile.dat ceph-custer:data/mydata
2019/12/02 13:26:23 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.49.5" starting with parameters ["./rclone-v1.49.5-linux-amd64/rclone" "-vvv" "copy" "--s3-chunk-size=50M" "/home/user/myfile.dat" "ceph-custer:data/mydata"]
2019/12/02 13:26:23 DEBUG : Using config file from "/root/rclone-v1.49.5-linux-amd64/rclone.conf"
2019/12/02 13:26:23 DEBUG : myfile.dat: Modification times differ by -18.718573627s: 2019-12-02 11:36:58.718573627 +0100 CET, 2019-12-02 11:36:40 +0100 CET
2019/12/02 13:26:24 DEBUG : myfile.dat: MD5 = 45cd09bdd16261f03588c31630decefd OK
2019/12/02 13:26:24 INFO  : myfile.dat: Updated modification time in destination
2019/12/02 13:26:24 DEBUG : myfile.dat: Unchanged skipping
2019/12/02 13:26:24 INFO  :
Transferred:   	         0 / 0 Bytes, -, 0 Bytes/s, ETA -
Errors:                 0
Checks:                 1 / 1, 100%
Transferred:            0 / 0, -
Elapsed time:          0s

2019/12/02 13:26:24 DEBUG : 5 go routines active
2019/12/02 13:26:24 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.49.5" finishing with parameters ["./rclone-v1.49.5-linux-amd64/rclone" "-vvv" "copy" "--s3-chunk-size=50M" "/home/user/myfile.dat" "ceph-custer:data/mydata"]
root@myhost ~ # echo $?
0
```
